form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for the protection of community centers with religious affiliation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Religiously Affiliated Institutions Act of 2017.

section.header: Protection of community centers with religious affiliation
section.text: Section 247 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(2), by inserting after threat of force, the following: including by threat of force against religious real property,;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3), by striking and at the end;
by redesignating paragraph (4) as paragraph (5); and
by inserting after paragraph (3) the following:

paragraph.text: if damage to or destruction of property results from the acts committed in violation of this section, which damage to or destruction of such property is in an amount that exceeds $5,000, a fine in accordance with this title and imprisonment for not more than 3 years, or both; and
in subsection (f), by inserting before the period at the end the following: , or real property owned or leased by a nonprofit, religiously affiliated organization.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 11, 2017.
